title: How to center a div in CSS
dot:
digraph CSS_Centering{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box];Introduction[label="Introduction
- Centering elements in CSS
- Overview of strategies"]; Auto_Margins[label="Centering with Auto Margins
- Use margin: auto
- Constraint: max-width: fit-content"]; Flexbox[label="Centering with Flexbox
- Use display: flex
- justify-content: center
- align-items: center
- Works for single/multiple children"]; Viewport[label="Centering within the Viewport
- Use position: fixed
- inset: 0
- margin: auto
- Constrained width/height"]; Unknown_Sizes[label="Centering with Unknown Sizes
- Use width: fit-content
- margin: auto"]; CSS_Grid[label="Centering with CSS Grid
- Use display: grid
- place-content: center
- Can stack multiple elements"]; Centering_Text[label="Centering Text
- Use text-align: center
- Works with block centering"]; Decision_Tree[label="When to Use Which Method
- Auto margins for single elements
- Positioned layout for floating UI
- CSS Grid for stacking
- text-align for text
- Flexbox for versatility"]; Conclusion[label="Conclusion
- Understanding CSS centering strategies
- Building a mental model for CSS"];Introduction->Auto_Margins;Introduction->Flexbox;Introduction->Viewport;Introduction->Unknown_Sizes;Introduction->CSS_Grid;Introduction->Centering_Text;Introduction->Decision_Tree;Decision_Tree->Conclusion;}
